metadata.name: A Colour Trip
metadata.description:
A Colour Trip is an ongoing, interconnected NFT series of playful meditations and improvisations on colour and form. Each artwork depicts a virtual, metaphysical representation of thought, energy, time and space, which examines the importance of finding, balance, harmony and simplicity in a world filled with disruption and uncertainty. 

Artist: Soh Ee Shaun 
Year: 2022
Size: 2022 x 2022 pixels
Medium: Digital
Format: JPG
Edition: 1/1
